thread.section_title: Backcountry Gear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Backcountry Gear | backcountrygear.com | 4 of 110
thread.title: Judith

author: Judith
title: Judith
text: Found the item I purchase to be cheaper at this location. They offered free shipping, and excellent tracking service for my item. When I opened the item it was in excellent shape. My item was wrapped up and sealed, showing that they took their time with assuring I'd get it in good shape. Ice since referred friend to find the same item I did on this site and will keep it in mind for the future!
